ai-mnd8:81.3_0: They understand there is little dust on the eyes, having great dust on the eyes, having sharp faculties and dull faculties, with good qualities and with bad qualities, easy to teach and hard to teach.
ai-mnd8:81.4_0: the world with its gods, Māras and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans, princes,
ai-mnd8:82.2_0: In the same way, this world with its gods, Māras and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, gods and humans, the Buddhas swappear in moved.
ai-mnd8:82.3_0: all the heavy burden is just like a heavy cow.
ai-mnd8:82.4_0: In the same way, those who have learned and comprehended with wisdom the Buddha taught today onwards.
ai-mnd8:82.5_0: a wise and virtuous decrease, (thinking): It is the greatest of the Buddha,
ai-mnd8:83.1_0: Even those aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics who are subtle, accomplished in the doctrines of others, hair-spliters. They seem to be considered as if they were created by the Realized One, and cut off their views and go to see you.
ai-mnd8:83.2_0: they are cleared, but they have seen him.
ai-mnd8:83.3_0: and they were shaking off, they increasing him.
ai-mnd8:83.4_0: Rather, the Buddha spoke of wisdom in this matter.
ai-mnd8:83.5_0: Hurt out the pair of poisons, ~ you will not shake off a plough in shake.
ai-mnd8:85.4_0: for you haven’t reached the end of suffering.”
ai-mnd8:86.1_0: The eighth day of the fortnight
